Notes.Text:
This update for docker fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed: 	  

- CVE-2018-15664: Fixed an issue which made docker cp vulnerable to symlink-exchange race attacks (bsc#1096726).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Docker through 18.06.1-ce-rc2, the API endpoints behind the 'docker cp' command are vulnerable to a symlink-exchange attack with Directory Traversal, giving attackers arbitrary read-write access to the host filesystem with root privileges, because daemon/archive.go does not do archive operations on a frozen filesystem (or from within a chroot).
